metadata.title: Alaska High-Altitude Aerial Photography
metadata.description: Data Type: Remotely Sensed Data;  Hardcopy 9"X9" frames of high-altitude (65,000 ft.) aerial photography flown on prescribed flight lines by NASA 1978-1986, in support of scientific research projects throughout Alaska. Hardcopy prints can be produced from film as needed. Snow free photography with less than 10% shadow and cloud cover. Photography flown between June 15 and August 30. The minimum sun angle is 30 degrees.
